name: Warpriest

skills.name: Admonish
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +59
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Divine Light
skills.raw_description: Heals a target ally by 20% of their MAX HP. Heals all allies except the target by 10% of the target's MAX HP.

skills.name: Bless Weapons
skills.raw_description:
Places a 25% [ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
